tictactoe.name: Tic Tac Toe
tictactoe.ranking: Ranking is based on order of winninig the imposible level.
tictactoe.instructions: Check 3 tiles in a row to win (any diraction is valid).

lizardtype.name: LizardType
lizardtype.ranking: Ranking is based on greater words per minute. Accuracy is the tiebreaker.
lizardtype.instructions: Type as many words as you can in the given time. Try to have the least amount of mistakes.

puzzle15.name: 15 Puzzle
puzzle15.ranking: Ranking is based on a combination of total correct guesses and accuracy.
puzzle15.instructions: Move tiles in grid to order them from 1 to 15.

pokemon.ranking: Ranking is based on faster times. Fewer moves are the tiebreaker.
